title: Lag, delay and high ping?
body:
Hello, 

First things first let me explain my situation and if I can't seem to get help here then I guess my last resort would be to send in a ticket and contact my ISP. 
I've been playing on NA for almost a year now, and I'm actually from Singapore. Even though yes, I know we have our own server there (SEA) I'm here because my laptop IS INCREDIBLY slow so I'm on a mac playing on NA since Garena SEA doesn't offer the mac version.

But anyways, I have only been getting these problems recently and everything was perfectly fine for like 10 months when I was playing? 
My FPS is usually at a STABLE 60, and as for my ms it's usually about 250-400? I'm not sure. But when it's really bad it's usually around 560-650.

As I said before I'm on a mac and I have NO IDEA what to do now to fix this. My internet works perfectly fine and speedtest results show that my connection is actually is normal. I'm kinda losing my patience because I'm losing TONS of games because of this.

Can anyone help me please? Thanks in advance to anyone that actually replies to this post.

replies.body: I've had a problem with ping since the last update. Before then, I'd have the occasional ping spikes but it usually wasn't that bad. But since the last patch, I've had ping spikes every few minutes. Also, at least once a game I have a severe lag spike where I stop seeing attack animations and can't target or attack anything. I've tried waiting a few minutes, but I usually have to disconnect and reconnect to the game a few times to get it back to normal. It's getting ridiculous, and on the verge of unplayable. I hate making my friends lose games because I can't stay in game. I've spent over 20 minutes trying to get the game to where it's playable and for my ping to go down. I'm about ready to just stop playing.

I am currently In Taiwan and for the last week i have been having some major connection and lag issues. Sometimes its fine sometimes its not and now im just not getting into the game at all


Now im getting an Unknown Error and a report has been sent. Ive just come off a low prio Que so hopefully i dont get banned

I know this post is old but are you still experiencing this issue? I'm also from SEA region and I play on OCE and NA and I'm going through the same thing. I feel like my internet is just fine, I did a speed test and its around 5 mbps (Normal speed here). I get like 270 ms on Oce which is quite high considering the fact that my usual ping there is supposed to be around 125 - 140 ms. Same goes for the NA server I get around 300 to 370+ ms and my usual ping there is 200 ms.

Played yesterday and today. 

Yesterday evening connection was so bad I could not even play and had to result in playing bot. Night came and everything went back to normal?
Today- it's the other way round. It's okay in the evening but it's 11PM here and I just played 1 game of ranked. NEEDLESS TO SAY IT WAS A LOSS AND CHAMP SEL WAS LAGGING SO BADLY TOO
now my ping wont go under 200 its spikes over 1000 im in canada it has never gone this bad it usually sits at 30

Yet, when I traceroute to the west coast (California) everything is fine.  So I have no clue if it's the LOL servers or my ISP.

Good, then I'm not the only one. I've tried getting a response from other players in-game about this issue, but... well, screaming "FUCK YOU" at the top of your lungs were among some of the _nicest_ responses I get.

Since the last update, I randomly get this intense lag. Last night was horrible. My ping was fine all day pretty much then just spikes over 1000ms in a game. I checked my internet after the game and it said my speed was fine so I tried another game..same thing happened. In both instances, I had perfect connection for the first 3 or so minutes..Got first blood and then "b" and, when I got back to lane, the lag started. I tried reconnecting to the game and then just tried waiting it out. Checked my speed again after the game and it was fine..I don't want to play until there's some kind of response on this issue.

IF you guys are all having the same issue why not try using Riots Connection KB to see if that helps with the issue. I was having high ping for awhile and after I used this it fixed it right up. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues {{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
